features.title: Realistic Physics
features.description: Experience authentic off-road physics with dynamic terrain interaction and realistic vehicle behavior.

features.title: Dynamic Weather
features.description: Face challenging weather conditions that affect terrain and driving mechanics.

features.title: Vehicle Customization
features.description: Upgrade your jeep with various parts and modifications to tackle different terrains.

features.title: Open World
features.description: Explore vast landscapes with unique challenges and hidden treasures.

features.title: Multiplayer Mode
features.description: Compete with friends in challenging off-road races and cooperative missions.

features.title: Dynamic Missions
features.description: Complete various missions with increasing difficulty and unique rewards.
